title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: There are incorrect labels in the Update Test Suite dialog. The labels should be fixed to ensure clarity and consistency in the user interface.
OB:
1. The label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as 'TestClasses' without a space between Test and Classes.
2. The status line mentions 'methods being selected' instead of 'types' being selected.
3. The action name in the dialog is written as 'TestSuite' without a space between Test and Suite.
EB:
1. The label 'Test Classes to be included' should be written as 'Test Classes to be included'.
2. The status line should mention 'types being selected' instead of 'methods being selected'.
3. The action name in the dialog should be written as 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
SR:
1. Open the Update Test Suite dialog.
2. Observe the label 'Test Classes to be included'.
3. Observe the status line mentioning 'methods being selected'.
4. Note the action name written as 'TestSuite'.
